pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Nonparametric Mixture Models // Functions to perform Bayesian nonparametric univariate and multivariate density estimation and clustering, by means of Pitman-Yor mixtures, and dependent Dirichlet process mixtures for partially exchangeable data. See Corradin et al. (2021) doi:10.18637/jss.v100.i15 for more details.
